short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f: Fortnite wallpapers bring your chrome a new look and useful tools
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,gu,kn,mr,te: Give your Chrome a new look with Fortnite wallpapers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Fortnite Wallpapers and New Tab plugin replaces your web browser's default new tab page, providing the following features:

- Showing a random wallpaper on every new tab opening
- Popular games playable in the browser
- Instant time and date
- Internet search service with search box
- Quick access to popular websites
